notices.title: Scheduled Maintenance

Hello Learners,

We've been working hard to make your educational journey smoother and more engaging. Hereâ€™s what's new:

* New Feature: Interactive Quizzes! Test your knowledge in real-time with our new interactive quiz formats, now available in most of our popular courses.
* Community Study Groups: You can now create or join study groups directly on the platform! Collaborate, share notes, and solve problems together.
* Faster Performance: Weâ€™ve optimized the entire site. You'll notice faster load times, smoother video playback, and a much better experience on mobile devices.
* New Courses Added: Check out our new arrivals in the "Data Science" and "Creative Writing" categories.

Log in now to explore the new features and see how we've made learning better for you.

Happy learning!
- The [Your Website Name] Team
